00024 #pragma once
00025 
00026 #include <thrust/detail/config.h>
00027 #include <thrust/device_ptr.h>
00028 #include <thrust/device_reference.h>
00029 #include <thrust/device_new.h>
00030 #include <thrust/device_delete.h>
00031 #include <limits>
00032 #include <stdexcept>
00033 
00034 namespace thrust
00035 {
00036 
00050 template<typename T>
00051   class device_new_allocator
00052 {
00053   public:
00054     typedef T                                 value_type;
00055     typedef device_ptr<T>                     pointer;
00056     typedef device_ptr<const T>               const_pointer;
00057     typedef device_reference<T>               reference;
00058     typedef device_reference<const T>         const_reference;
00059     typedef std::size_t                       size_type;
00060     typedef typename pointer::difference_type difference_type;
00061 
00062     // convert a device_new_allocator<T> to device_new_allocator<U>
00063     template<typename U>
00064       struct rebind
00065     {
00066       typedef device_new_allocator<U> other;
00067     }; // end rebind
00068 
00069     __host__ __device__
00070     inline device_new_allocator() {}
00071 
00072     __host__ __device__
00073     inline ~device_new_allocator() {}
00074 
00075     __host__ __device__
00076     inline device_new_allocator(device_new_allocator const&) {}
00077 
00078     template<typename U>
00079     __host__ __device__
00080     inline device_new_allocator(device_new_allocator<U> const&) {}
00081 
00082     // address
00083     __host__ __device__
00084     inline pointer address(reference r) { return &r; }
00085     
00086     __host__ __device__
00087     inline const_pointer address(const_reference r) { return &r; }
00088 
00089     // memory allocation
00090     __host__
00091     inline pointer allocate(size_type cnt,
00092                             const_pointer = const_pointer(static_cast<T*>(0)))
00093     {
00094       if(cnt > this->max_size())
00095       {
00096         throw std::bad_alloc();
00097       } // end if
00098 
00099       // use "::operator new" rather than keyword new
00100       return pointer(device_new<T>(cnt));
00101     } // end allocate()
00102 
00103     __host__
00104     inline void deallocate(pointer p, size_type cnt)
00105     {
00106       // use "::operator delete" rather than keyword delete
00107       device_delete(p);
00108     } // end deallocate()
00109 
00110     __host__ __device__
00111     inline size_type max_size() const
00112     {
00113       return std::numeric_limits<size_type>::max() / sizeof(T);
00114     } // end max_size()
00115 
00116     __host__ __device__
00117     inline bool operator==(device_new_allocator const&) { return true; }
00118 
00119     __host__ __device__
00120     inline bool operator!=(device_new_allocator const &a) {return !operator==(a); }
00121 }; // end device_new_allocator
00122 
00126 } // end thrust
